answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!Low on energy, hungry, losing weight etc all are possible in diabetes. Get your blood sugar level checked. Also there is a chance that you have acidity or IBS or Crohn’s disease or Celiac disease. Alternate loose stools and constipation is possible in all these cases.Your gut issues can be responsible for malnutrition due to poor absorption. Please discuss these possibilities with your doctor. You may need a referral to a gastroenterologist.Hope this helps. Do let me know if there is any thing else and keep me posted. Take care!
I would definitely seek the advice of a gastroenerologist or an endocrinologist.  I'm thinking- Celiac (gluten allergy) or hyperthyroidism.
